Smart Laundry Basket: A high-tech laundry basket that can sort and categorize clothes based on their fabric type, color, and soil level. It can also detect when an item is dirty and alert the user when it's time to do laundry.

Collapsible Laundry Basket: A collapsible laundry basket that can be easily stored in a small space when not in use. It's made of lightweight, durable materials and can be easily folded and stored in a closet or under a bed.

Magnetic Laundry Basket: A laundry basket with built-in magnets that allow it to stick to any metal surface, such as a refrigerator or washing machine. This makes it easy to transport and store laundry without having to lift or carry it.

Portable Laundry Basket: A laundry basket that can be easily carried and transported to a laundromat or to a friend's house for washing. It's made of lightweight materials and has a handle that makes it easy to carry.

Automatic Laundry Basket: A laundry basket that can automatically sort and categorize clothes based on their fabric type, color, and soil level. It can also detect when an item is dirty and alert the user when it's time to do laundry. The basket can be controlled through a smartphone app, making it easy to manage laundry from anywhere in the house.
